snippet.title: Sonic Rumble - Customization & Mode Trailer
snippet.description:
Who's ready to rumble!? Play as some of your favorite characters from the Sonic the Hedgehog universe complete with customization to create your perfect avatar as you dive into action-packed gameplay in this 32-person battle royale!

Learn more about Sonic Rumble: https://sonicrumble.sega.com

Follow along on Twitter for the latest Sonic Rumble news: https://twitter.com/Sonic_Rumble

Also, check out our other social pages to stay up to date on the latest Sonic happenings:

https://twitter.com/sonic_hedgehog
https://facebook.com/sonic
https://instagram.com/sonicthehedgehog
https://tiktok.com/@sonic_hedgehog
